info.name: RoundCube Mail
info.author: Martin Reinhardt
info.description:
Embedd roundcube interface in owncloud:
The app was tested with OC 4.0.0-4.0.6 and works with RoundCube 0.7.x and 0.8.rc. The following browsers are working: Safari 5/6, Firefox 14, Chrome/Chromium Please refer to the the documentation regarding installing and updating the application. If there are any issues feel free top an issue on github for this.
Homepage
